meanings.definition: A type of brown algae found in cold waters.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study laminarians to learn about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The laminarians in the sea must be wearing tiny sweaters to stay warm!
meanings.sent4: The laminarians swayed gently in the frigid currents like underwater dancers.
meanings.sent5: The laminarians create beautiful underwater forests in the icy waters.

meanings.definition: A person who studies or works with laminarians.
meanings.sent1: The laminarians expert shared fascinating facts about algae.
meanings.sent2: Laminarians often conduct research in marine biology.
meanings.sent3: The laminarians enthusiast had a seaweed-themed birthday party!
meanings.sent4: She dove into the world of laminarians like a dedicated explorer.
meanings.sent5: The laminarians specialist spends hours observing seaweed in its natural habitat.
